name: Arcadia - Timed Lock & Key Puzzle Prototype
name_original: Arcadia - Timed Lock & Key Puzzle Prototype
description:
You're about to play a minigame designed for a WIP piece of gamedev.

Your goal is to "hack" the computer in the coffee shop.

You have a one-minute time limit, but no need to rush. If you can't do it within a minute, you'll be brought back to the beginning to try again.
